snippet: The mandolinist Avi Avital was joined by the Enso String Quartet and others in Weill Recital Hall at Carnegie Hall.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by classical mandolinist Avi Avital at Weill Recital Hall, including New York debut of David Bruce piece Cymbeline, performed with Enso String Quartet.
lead_paragraph: The mandolinist Avi Avital was joined by the Enso String Quartet and others in Weill Recital Hall at Carnegie Hall.

headline.seo: Avi Avital Helps Revive, and Grow, an Instrument
headline.main: Repertory of Mandolin Is in Motion
headline.print_headline: Repertory of Mandolin is in Motion
